tagline.label: With our integration, you can easily create Smart Shopping campaigns to advertise your products on Google and keep track of their performance comfortably within your shop administration. Smart Shopping campaigns combine your product feed and Google's machine learning to achieve the best possible result. This way, the campaign learns and improves continuously, helping you to reach more online shoppers and maximize your sales revenue. Get started by signing in with Google.

description.label: Our integration manages your Google Merchant Center and Google Ads accounts on your behalf. After you have exported your products to your Merchant Center account and set up your billing information in your Google Ads account, you can use the integration to easily create your campaign in your shop administration. As the integration is connected to your Google accounts, you can also conveniently track your campaigns there.
Connect your shop to a Merchant Center account and upload the shop and product data to Google. You can either use an existing account or simply create a new one without even leaving your shop.
Export the products you want to promote to Google and automatically synchronise them.
Create a Google Ads account directly from your shop administration to manage your campaigns and campaign data.
Create Smart Shopping campaigns and showcase your products to millions of shoppers across Google Search, Shopping, Gmail, YouTube, and the Display Network.
View the number of conversions and the revenue your campaign generates for you directly in your shop administration.
Keep an overview of the benefits and costs of your campaigns in our performance report. This enables you to evaluate the success of your campaign.
